Translating the precision efficacy of aesthetic clinics into oral cellular-level nutritional directives.

originHistory.title: Brand Origin
originHistory.subtitle: Metamorphosis from Aesthetic Clinic to Cellular Laboratory. It all began with a dialogue between two spaces.
originHistory.description: At The Cosmetic Clinic founded by Dr. Shona Dalzell, cutting-edge equipment delivered immediate transformations—yet failed to satisfy aesthetic seekers’ longing for "long-lasting radiance."In the skin research laboratory: as a PhD in Dermatology from the University of Auckland, she discerned the core of the problem—all external manifestations stem from imbalances in cellular states.When medicine meets aesthetics, a revolutionary vision was born:Translating the precision efficacy of aesthetic clinics into oral cellular-level nutritional directives.After seven years of R&D, Fantasy Care embarked on the concept of "Luxurious Nourishment from Within," pioneering a new era of oral medical aesthetics.

originHistory.title: Brand Vision
originHistory.subtitle: Fantasy Care: With medicine as the brush and time as the canvas.
originHistory.description: we compose a poem of inner-to-outer revitalization.We firmly believe that nourishment from within is the ultimate luxury in care; regeneration is the most graceful attainment.Here, beauty is a precise mastery of cellular vitality—a scientific ritual loyal to one’s true self.

originHistory.title: Nourishment from Within
originHistory.subtitle: The Oral Revolution of Medical Aesthetic Technology
originHistory.description: We delve deep into the skin’s foundational layers, activating the skin’s intrinsic revitalization program with targeted nutrition.Like providing cells with a precise "repair blueprint," we promote collagen self-synthesis, strengthen the defensive barrier, and achieve systematic improvements from within.This is not merely skincare—it is a scientific ritual guiding the skin toward self-regeneration.

originHistory.title: Luxurious Care
originHistory.subtitle: A Commitment to Pharmaceutical-Grade Quality
originHistory.description: The cornerstone of luxury lies in impeccable rigor.From globally sourcing clinically validated active ingredients to adhering to pharmaceutical-grade GMP production standards, we strictly oversee every step—from raw materials to finished products—with scientific precision.This near-obsessive commitment ensures that every dose delivers a safe, pure, and high-efficacy luxurious experience.

originHistory.title: Regeneration
originHistory.subtitle: A Comprehensive Transformation of Overall Vitality
originHistory.description: Regeneration is the ultimate masterpiece of mind-body synergy.It manifests as the skin’s delicate radiance, the hair’s robust resilience, and the calm vitality of body and mind.We pursue not fleeting modification, but long-lasting, stable, and visible improvements in overall well-being—empowering you to embrace a radiant new self from within.

developmentHistory.title: Medical Inspiration
description: Born from a revolutionary insight in a New Zealand dermatological laboratory: True beauty stems from the reconstruction of internal cellular order.We aspire to integrate aesthetic medical effects into oral technology.

developmentHistory.title: System Forging
description: Established a comprehensive pharmaceutical-grade R&D and supply chain system, defining internal beauty with the rigorous standards of pharmaceuticals—laying a solid cornerstone of trust for every commitment.

developmentHistory.title: Brilliant Inauguration
description: Fantasy Care was elegantly launched in New Zealand.Its "medical aesthetic-grade oral" concept quickly gained recognition and endorsement from pioneering women worldwide.

developmentHistory.title: Global Certification
description: The entire product line has been awarded New Zealand GMP, HACCP, and Halal certifications, with quality earning international recognition.Business has steadily expanded to key markets in Asia-Pacific and Europe, establishing a global benchmark for scientific brands.

developmentHistory.title: Endless Exploration
description: We continue to delve into the forefront of skin science and nutrition, reshaping the future boundaries of beauty through relentless scientific research.

drShona.name: Dr Shona Dalzell
background1: Graduated from the University of Auckland in 1993
A member of the New Zealand Society of Aesthetic Medicine (NZSCM) and holding a diploma in aesthetic medicine
Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBChB)
background2: Fellow of the Royal College of General Practitioners of New Zealand (FRNZGP)
Member of the New Zealand Skin Cancer Medical Association (MNZSCM)
Certified Skin Cancer Specialist (MACP) by the Chinese Medical Doctor Association
Certified Skin Cancer Specialist, Venous Disease Specialist, Certified Sclerotherapy Specialist, Venous Medicine Specialist, Aesthetic Medicine Specialist

clinicalCooperation.title: Medical Aesthetic Clinical Cooperation
clinicalCooperation.description: Jointly launched packages such as "Oral + Photofacial" with renowned clinics including CACI, Skin Institute The Cosmetic Clinic, and KAIZ Skin Body & Injectable Clinic. Physician Education System: Launched the "Global Oral Medical Aesthetics Physician Certification Program", trained over 2,000 dermatologists and developed an AI-assisted decision-making system.

awards.name: 2025 Southern Cross International Medical Aesthetics Gold Award
2025 New Zealand Silver Fern Award for Dietary Nutritional Supplements
Princess of Monaco Pinnacle Award for Anti-Aging Formula Innovation
Switzerland Nutritional Innovation Technology Gold Award
Annual Influential Benchmark Brand | European Nutrition & Health Summit
Annual Consumer-Trusted Oral Brand | International Beauty Industry Innovation Award
Milan, Italy Global Dietary Supplement Invention Grand Award
